A C D G H I M N P R S T V

A

AUTOMATIC_THRESHOLD_PX - Static variable in class com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino.Scalr
Threshold in pixels (width or height) at which point a scaling operation using the "AUTOMATIC" method will use to decide if an image should use the SPEED method (if bigger than threshold) or the QUALITY method (if smaller than threshold).

G

getAckErrors() - Method in class com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino.Rainbowduino
how may times the serial response was missing / invalid
getArduinoBufferSize() - Method in class com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino.Rainbowduino
return the serial buffer size of the arduino the buffer is by default 128 bytes - if the buffer is most of the time almost full (>110 bytes) you probabely send too much serial data
getArduinoErrorCounter() - Method in class com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino.Rainbowduino
get last error code from arduino if the errorcode is between 100..109 - serial connection issue (pc-arduino issue) if the errorcode is < 100 it's a i2c lib error code (arduino-rainbowduino error) check http://arduino.cc/en/Reference/WireEndTransmission for more information
getArduinoHeartbeat() - Method in class com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino.Rainbowduino
per default arduino update this library each 3s with statistic information this value save the timestamp of the last message.
getMD5(byte[]) - Static method in class com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino.HelperUtils
get md5 checksum of an byte array
getMD5(byte[]) - Static method in class com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino.RainbowduinoHelper

initRainbowduino(byte) - Method in class com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino.Rainbowduino
initialize an rainbowduino device - send the initial image to the rainbowduino. check arduinoErrorCounter for any errors.

R

Rainbowduino - Class in com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino
library to communicate with an arduino via serial port
the arduino control up to n rainbowduinos using the i2c protocol

part of the neorainbowduino library TODO: add blacklist for serial port detection!

resize(BufferedImage, int) - Static method in class com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino.Scalr
Resize a given image (maintaining its proportion) to a width and height of the given target size using the scaling method of Scalr.Method.AUTOMATIC.
resize(BufferedImage, Scalr.Method, int) - Static method in class com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino.Scalr
Resize a given image (maintaining its proportion) to a width and height of the given target size using the given scaling method.
resize(BufferedImage, Scalr.Method, int, int) - Static method in class com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino.Scalr
Resize a given image (maintaining its proportion) to the target width and height using the given scaling method.
resize(BufferedImage, Scalr.Method, int, int, boolean, boolean) - Static method in class com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino.Scalr
Resize a given image (maintaining its proportion) to the target width and height using the given scaling method and optionally print out performance and debugging information while doing it.

S

Scalr - Class in com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino
Class used to implement performant, good-quality and intelligent image scaling algorithms in native Java.
Scalr() - Constructor for class com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino.Scalr
 
Scalr.Method - Enum in com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino
Used to define the different scaling hints that the algorithm can prefer.

sendFrame(byte, byte[]) - Method in class com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino.Rainbowduino
send a frame to the active rainbowduino the data needs to be in this format: buffer[3][8][4], The array to be sent formatted as [color][row][dots]
sendRgbFrame(byte, int[]) - Method in class com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino.Rainbowduino
wrapper class to send a RGB image to the rainbowduino.
sendRgbFrame(byte, PApplet) - Method in class com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino.Rainbowduino
Send the image data of an PApplet to a Rainbowduino Device.
sendRgbFrame(byte, PImage) - Method in class com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino.Rainbowduino
Send a PImage to a Rainbowduino Device.
sendRgbFrame(byte, byte, PApplet) - Method in class com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino.Rainbowduino
Send a PApplet to two Rainbowduino Device.
sendRgbFrame(byte, byte, PImage) - Method in class com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino.Rainbowduino
Send a PImage to two Rainbowduino Device.
sendRgbFrame(byte, byte, byte, byte, PApplet) - Method in class com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino.Rainbowduino
Send a PImage to four Rainbowduino Device arranged as cube The image gets resized and converted to a Rainbowduino compatible format.
sendRgbFrame(byte, byte, byte, byte, PImage) - Method in class com.neophob.lib.rainbowduino.Rainbowduino
Send a PImage to four Rainbowduino Device arranged as cube The image gets resized and converted to a Rainbowduino compatible format.
